sub_title: IT Procurement and Category Management Professional
summary:
Professional with 25+years of experience in high technology products and services with Multinational corporations like BT, Israel Chemicals Ltd (ICL), Philips Electronics and ATOS. Professional work experience in India, China, Singapore, Hong Kong, Netherlands, Germany, Norway and Sweden.

Responsible for wide range of IT products and services. Managing a total spend of approximately £600 Mn comprising Hardware, Software and Security products. Managing relationships with key partners and suppliers like Cisco, IBM, Microsoft, Fortinet, McAfee, Palo Alto, Checkpoint, CrowdStrike, F5, Forescout, NetScout, Qualys, Skybox, Zscaler, Akamai, Symantec and others. Managing large distributors like Westcon, Arrow, TechData, Ingram Micro, Exclusive Networks, WestCoast, Exertis, ASM Tech, Computacentre are key part of the responsibilities. I am also responsible for defining a strategy for the category, introduce new tools and processes which are embracing new technologies like AI, IOT in making smart sourcing a way of life. 

Have been an entrepreneur helping SME's in their IT Procurement activities including strategic sourcing, spend analysis, category management and contract governance. While working on long term strategic initiatives and introducing innovative technologies, it is important to develop new partners and substitutes to replace bottlenecks and unreliable suppliers. I supported in such strategic decisions and projects while their internal procurement teams focused on short term, day to day procurement operations.

Managing 150+ Contracts, working with legal and product teams to define new contracts, managing vendor performance against contracts, adopting Master Service Agreements with local LSA's. Helping vendors for payments by following up with Account Payables.

Key Strengths

•Relationships at ‘C” Levels, delight customers, exceeding expectations, leading teams, collaborate with multi disciplinary teams, deliver quality results. Negotiating with customers and suppliers/partners in both collaborative (win-win propositions) and competitive (best price/terms) situations.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for wide range of IT procurement, strategic sourcing and vendor management
 - software and cloud services from Microsoft, Salesforce, SAP, QAD and others
 - mobile and fixed telephony services from T-Mobile, Vodafone, KPN and others
- network services, SDWAN, internet from telecom vendors like GTT, BT, Verizon and others
There is never a dull day in the indirect procurement group which is a key part of the Global Procurement organization. One day it is a major business transformation project to set up a e-Commerce portal, another day it is a discussion with a vendor to migrate all applications to Azure cloud, third day it is a digitization of a mandatory legal document (eMCR) for our trucks transporting the goods criss-crossing all over Europe, implementation of a new compensation SAP module for our HR, or it could be setting up a new document management system for our factory. Some times you are also called upon to support other activities like Facility Management, Professional services, travel, lease cars or cleaning services which are a part of the Indirect Procurement group.
